exit_steps.title: Tax Office Notification (Départ à l'étranger)
exit_steps.deadline: Following January/February when declaring previous year's taxes
requirements: Notification via personal space on impots.gouv.fr
exit_steps.notes: You must inform your local tax office of your move even if you leave mid-year.
